Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, City of Rayne
Constable -- Justice of the Peace Ward  2
PW Sports Wagering -- Authorize Sports Wagering Activities - Act 215, 2020
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE SPORTS WAGERING ACTIVITIES.
Race.FullText: Shall sports wagering activities and operations be permitted in the parish of Acadia?

Race.SpecificTitle: Bayou Mallet Gravity Drainage District -- 5.04 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bayou Mallet Gravity Drainage District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Bayou Mallet Gravity Drainage District of the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of five and four hundredths (5.04) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $370,500) on all the property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and/or operating gravity works within and for the District?
